snippet: Swansea City sacked manager Bob Bradley on Tuesday less than three months after the American took charge, with the January transfer window looming and the Premier League's second-bottom club desperate to get out of relegation trouble....

headline.main: Swansea City Sack American Manager Bradley
headline.print_headline: Swansea City Sack American Manager Bradley

lead_paragraph: Swansea City sacked manager Bob Bradley on Tuesday less than three months after the American took charge, with the January transfer window looming and the Premier League's second-bottom club desperate to get out of relegation trouble.

snippet: Manager Eddie Howe has heaped praise on Bournemouth owners for having realistic expectations from the club and said Leicester City's unexpected title triumph last season has in no way raised the stakes for the Premier League's lesser lights....

headline.main: Howe Praises Bournemouth Owners' Realistic Expectations
headline.print_headline: Howe Praises Bournemouth Owners' Realistic Expectations

lead_paragraph: Manager Eddie Howe has heaped praise on Bournemouth owners for having realistic expectations from the club and said Leicester City's unexpected title triumph last season has in no way raised the stakes for the Premier League's lesser lights.

snippet: Crystal Palace's 1-1 draw at Watford in the Premier League had a sting in the tail as an argument blew up over the behaviour of the home team's mascot Harry the Hornet....

headline.main: Watford Draw Has Sting in the Tail as Mascot Row Erupts
headline.print_headline: Watford Draw Has Sting in the Tail as Mascot Row Erupts

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace's 1-1 draw at Watford in the Premier League had a sting in the tail as an argument blew up over the behaviour of the home team's mascot Harry the Hornet.

snippet: Evergreen striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic may have exceeded the expectations of many in the first half of the Premier League season, but former Manchester United midfielder Bojan Djordjic is not surprised he has quickly become the team's leader....

headline.main: 'Goal Machine' Zlatan Has Become United's Leader-Djordjic
headline.print_headline: 'Goal Machine' Zlatan Has Become United's Leader-Djordjic

lead_paragraph: Evergreen striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic may have exceeded the expectations of many in the first half of the Premier League season, but former Manchester United midfielder Bojan Djordjic is not surprised he has quickly become the team's leader.

snippet: Arsene Wenger believes the Premier League title is "Chelsea's to lose" and the Arsenal manager is ready to salute Antonio Conte's men should they surpass the Gunners' record of 14 consecutive top-flight victories....

headline.main: Chelsea's Title to Lose, Says Arsenal's Wenger
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Title to Lose, Says Arsenal's Wenger

lead_paragraph: Arsene Wenger believes the Premier League title is "Chelsea's to lose" and the Arsenal manager is ready to salute Antonio Conte's men should they surpass the Gunners' record of 14 consecutive top-flight victories.

snippet: Southampton manager Claude Puel is enjoying their busy fixture schedule and will draw on his past experience of playing every three days to steer the club through the festive period....

headline.main: Saints Boss Puel Prefers a Game Every Three Days
headline.print_headline: Saints Boss Puel Prefers a Game Every Three Days

lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Claude Puel is enjoying their busy fixture schedule and will draw on his past experience of playing every three days to steer the club through the festive period.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has labelled it unfair that teams he believes are inferior to his side are higher in the Premier League table....

headline.main: Unfair That Inferior Teams Are Higher Than United-Mourinho
headline.print_headline: Unfair That Inferior Teams Are Higher Than United-Mourinho

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has labelled it unfair that teams he believes are inferior to his side are higher in the Premier League table.

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic is banking on Manchester United winning the FA Cup to give his team automatic qualification for next season's Europa League....

headline.main: West Ham's Bilic Banks on Man United FA Cup Victory
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Bilic Banks on Man United FA Cup Victory

lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic is banking on Manchester United winning the FA Cup to give his team automatic qualification for next season's Europa League.

snippet: Chelsea's Brazil midfielder Oscar is closing in on a move to Chinese club Shanghai SIPG....

headline.main: Chelsea's Oscar Close to Joining Chinese Club Shanghai SIPG
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Oscar Close to Joining Chinese Club Shanghai SIPG

snippet: Manager Ronald Koeman does not expect to win trophies with Everton this season but will use the next two transfer windows to build a squad capable of challenging for honours in the future....

headline.main: Everton Must Buy in Order to Chase Trophies-Koeman
headline.print_headline: Everton Must Buy in Order to Chase Trophies-Koeman

lead_paragraph: Manager Ronald Koeman does not expect to win trophies with Everton this season but will use the next two transfer windows to build a squad capable of challenging for honours in the future.
